definition: incoming letter/letter from afar/same as 来信
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: We are in receipt of your letter.
Welcome all customers customized letter to inquire.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各方客戶來函來電諮詢定製。

sentences.english: Welcome to talk about the cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老客戶來電來函洽談合作事宜。

sentences.english: This is to acknowledge receipt of your letter regarding the above-captioned matter.
sentences.chinese: 確認收到您關於提及上述事件的來函。

sentences.english: Welcome letter calls to discuss the export wholesale and retail business.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來函來電商討出口批發和零售業務。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of 20 May 2000.
sentences.chinese: 二零零零年五月二十日來函收到，不勝感激。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome the traders to come here and talk business…
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎廣大國內外客戶來人來函洽談業務。

sentences.english: I have just received your letter telling me your recent marriage.
sentences.chinese: 頃接來函，承你告我近日結婚。

sentences.english: Warmly welcome customers at home and abroad calls letter consulting, business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 熱情歡迎國內外的客戶來函來電諮詢，洽談業務。

sentences.english: Your letter expressing the hope of entering into business connection with us has been received with thanks.
sentences.chinese: 你方表達願與我方建立業務關係的來函收悉，謝謝。

sentences.english: Welcome to contact us by calling or letter.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎海內外客商來電來函洽談業務聯繫。

sentences.english: Welcome foreign cooperation in the talks to seek common development.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎有意合作的中外人士來函來電洽談，共謀發展。

sentences.english: Today we received your reply confirming that the figure is 2540 pieces.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們接到你方來函確認訂購數量爲2540。

sentences.english: With all sincerity welcome domestic and international the medical treatment field personage bearer your letter talks guide.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎國內外醫療界人士來人來函洽談指導。

sentences.english: Welcome to consult by letter or phone.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來函來電諮詢翻譯公司。

sentences.english: We have received your letter of July 1, enquiring about the best terms of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司7月1日來函就該商品優惠條件的詢盤敬悉。

definition: Taixi or Taihsi township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Gong1 hui4 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: PRC National Development and Reform Commission
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Gai3 ge2 Wei3

definition: to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
to deliver/to send a letter/a letter (of complaint, opinion etc)
